parts.name: Ford Panther Platform Suspension Swap
parts.description: Suspension components (control arms, spindles, springs, shocks) are interchangeable between Ford Crown Victoria, Mercury Grand Marquis, and Lincoln Town Car of the same vintage. 2003+ models have a completely different front suspension (aluminum cradle) than 1979-2002 models.
specs: 1979-2002: Recirculating ball steering, stamped arms
2003-2011: Rack & pinion, aluminum control arms, coil-overs
Police Interceptor (P71) parts are heavy duty upgrades for civilian models

models.name: Town Car
models.notes: Panther Platform (Air suspension common on rear)

parts.name: Honda Civic / Acura Integra Brake Swap
parts.description: Acura Integra (DC2) front and rear disc brakes are a direct bolt-on upgrade for Honda Civics (EG/EK). The 'Big Brake' upgrade involves using Integra knuckles and calipers.
specs: Integra front rotors are larger (10.3")
Rear disc conversion requires Integra trailing arms and e-brake cables
Master cylinder upgrade recommended (15/16" or 1")

parts.name: Toyota Camry / Lexus ES Engine Mounts
parts.description: Engine and transmission mounts are shared between Toyota Camry and Lexus ES models of the same generation (XV chassis).
specs: Check engine configuration (V6 vs I4)
Dog bone mounts are common failure points and interchangeable

parts.name: Nissan 350Z / Infiniti G35 Suspension Arms
parts.description: Most suspension arms (control arms, camber arms, toe arms) are identical between the Nissan 350Z (Z33) and Infiniti G35 (V35).
specs: Front lower control arms are a common wear item
Rear spring buckets are interchangeable
Shocks/Springs fit but have different rates/lengths (G35 is heavier)

parts.name: VW Golf / Audi A3 MQB Brake Swap
parts.description: Brake components (calipers, rotors, pads) are highly interchangeable across the VW Group MQB platform. You can bolt Porsche Macan (4-piston) calipers onto a VW Golf GTI or Audi A3 with minimal modification.
specs: Platform: MQB
Macan Caliper Swap: Requires specific rotors (usually 340mm or 345mm)
Golf R / S3 brakes are a direct upgrade for base Golf / A3

parts.name: Subaru Impreza / Forester Suspension Swap
parts.description: Forester struts are longer than Impreza struts, allowing for a cheap lift on an Impreza or a drop on a Forester (using Impreza struts). Top hats usually match within generations.
specs: SF Forester (98-02) <-> GC/GD Impreza (93-07)
SG Forester (03-08) <-> GD/GG Impreza (02-07)
Requires alignment after swap

parts.name: Mazda Miata (NC) / RX-8 Suspension Parts
parts.description: The NC Miata shares its chassis architecture with the RX-8. Front control arms, hubs, and brakes can be swapped. RX-8 sway bars are a popular upgrade for the NC Miata.
specs: RX-8 Yellow Dot sway bars are stiffer
RX-8 front hubs are stronger (5-lug vs 5-lug, but beefier bearing)
Brakes: RX-8 brakes are larger but require 17" wheels

parts.name: Jeep Cherokee XJ / Grand Cherokee ZJ Suspension
parts.description: Front suspension components (coils, control arms, track bar) are interchangeable between XJ Cherokee and ZJ Grand Cherokee. V8 ZJ coils give about 1-2 inches of lift on an XJ.
specs: ZJ V8 Front Coils -> XJ Lift
ZJ Tie Rod -> XJ Upgrade (Solid bar vs hollow)
Control arms are same length

parts.name: Dodge Ram / Durango / Dakota Magnum Engines
parts.description: The 5.2L (318) and 5.9L (360) Magnum V8s are interchangeable between Ram, Dakota, and Durango. Accessories and oil pans may vary.
specs: Magnum V8s (1992-2003)
Intake manifolds (Keggers) are interchangeable
Sensors are largely the same

parts.name: BMW E36 / E46 Parts Bin
parts.description: Many parts interchange between E36 and E46 3-Series, especially engines (M50/M52/M54 families) and transmissions (ZF/Getrag).
specs: E46 steering rack (Purple Tag) is a popular upgrade for E36
Rear trailing arm bushings (RTABs) are same size
Wheels are interchangeable (5x120, similar offsets)
